attributes.action: Amy Winehouse, Pete Doherty, Lindsay Lohan, Britney Spears and Paris Hilton should be banned from all forms of media
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'm sure I'm not the only one that is fed up of Amy Winehouse, Pete Doherty, Lindsay Lohan, Britney Spears and Paris Hilton getting more famous because of the media attention they get because of there idiotic behaviour. There should be a law in place to ban them from all forms of media. Then others can be added as time goes by.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
